method Module¶

class method.VelocityVerlet(dt=0.0001, T=0.01, state=None, USE_C=True, USE_PLOTTING=True, USE_LOGGING=True)[source]¶

Class to apply Velocity-Verlet to a given state using a given looping method.

Parameters:
  • dt (double) – Time step size, can be specified at integrate call.
  • T (double) – End time, can be specified at integrate call.
  • USE_C (bool) – Flag to use C looping and kernel.
  • USE_PLOTTING (bool) – Flag to plot state at certain progress points.
  • USE_LOGGING (bool) – Flag to log energy at each iteration.
integrate(dt=None, T=None)[source]¶

Integrate state forward in time.

Parameters:
  • dt (double) – Time step size.
  • T (double) – End time.
